dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset used for semi-supervised node classification and node clustering, where nodes represent articles, edges represent citations, and labels represent research areas.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: A. Grover
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset used for semi-supervised node classification and node clustering, where nodes represent articles, edges represent citations, and labels represent research areas.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: L. Tang
H. Liu
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset used for semi-supervised node classification and node clustering, where nodes represent articles, edges represent citations, and labels represent research areas.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: L. Tang
H. Liu
dcterms:description: A social relationships network of bloggers used for multi-label node classification, where nodes represent bloggers and labels represent their interests inferred from the text information provided by the bloggers.
dcterms:title: Blogcatalog

dcterms:creator: L. Tang
H. Liu
dcterms:description: A co-occurrence network of words used for multi-label node classification, where nodes represent words and labels denote the Part-of-Speech tags inferred via the Stanford POS-Tagger.
dcterms:title: POS (Part-of-Speech)
